Internship Briefing 2024
Pfeiffer Chung
Pfeiffer is an internship specialist with experience in internship and career services spanning more than ten years . She holds a specialist diploma in career counselling .
She is passionate about guiding students to enhance their  self-awareness to pursue their dream internships and jobs purposefully .

In her previous stint, she managed internship programmes and job placements for students spanning across industries . She managed internships and jobs placements across industries spanning across industry .
She had collaborated with more than 1,000 organisations to secure internship opportunities . She provided career advice and internship briefings to the students .

Pre-interview Preparation

Dressing Professionally, dress appropriately for the role and company . For corporate roles, wear a suit; for start-ups, business casual may suffice . When in doubt, dress more formally to make a strong first impression .
Have a list of questions ready for the interviewer about company culture, role expectations, or professional development opportunities . This shows your genuine interest .
Know the company's mission, products/services, and competitors to answer questions confidently and demonstrate your knowledge . Research under way to understand the company, role, and industry .
Securing your Internship
A dedicated job portal for graduate jobs, internships, part-time, and temporary positions across industries across industries .
Search for opportunities that match your preferred job function, job type or industry . Create a profile page, review your account information, upload resumes, cover letters and cover letters .
Access NUS Talent can sign up to be part of the NUS talent pool at NUSTalent HQ . Follow us on Facebook and Twitter feeds .
Popular job portals like LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, and AngelList offer a quick and efficient way to find internship options .
Check out NUS-CFG Career Events, including Postgraduate Career Fair 2024, and TalentXperience 2024 .
Network to gain access to all the other hidden jobs out there . Adopt a multi-pronged approach in your internship/ job search .
NUS Centre for Future-ready Graduates is based at the NUS University of Cambridge . NUS is the UK's largest university university in the world and has the largest number of graduates in the country .
